title:
Dayton Kettering Ohio Steakhouse Restaurant -- Flemings has raised the ante for Dayton Dining.

The ...

object.content:
Dayton Kettering Ohio Steakhouse Restaurant -- Flemings has raised the ante for Dayton Dining.

The Conjunction of our anniversary and son, Jolyon’s, birthday was the felicitous occasion of a celebration at Flemings Steakhouse, last night.

Aimee Hartke, Jacqueline Ayers and Manager Eli marshaled their staff to cosset us and our twelve guests in a most comfortable cocoon of good food and bonhomie.

All our preparations for special cakes and flowers were coordinated flawlessly and with all the “moving parts” invisible to our notice or concern, like the vigorously paddling feet of a swan serenely gliding across a pond.

Our party easily moved from our drinks reception in the bar to our table and seamlessly into our meal.  Host and guests turned to the great conversation and mutual enjoyment that such a convocation of good company and good food can bestow. 

Everyone’s dinner was as ordered, sizzling super steaks were served , and done to perfection.  Fleming’s simply offers the best wine selection in Dayton -- and it is a price performer.

Thanks to all at Flemings, for making our celebration so enjoyable and easy.  What a wonderful beneficence it is for us in Dayton to be able to call upon these restaurant professionals.  Flemings is the best Steakhouse in Dayton or Ohio, for that matter.

Private Dining Director Jacqueline Ayers 
Main: 937-320-9548 
Cell: 937-716-4148
 Private Dining Email
Planning Your Event Private Dining Menus

Fleming's Dayton, voted best steak in Dayton for 2008 by the Dayton Business Journal, is an ongoing celebration of exceptional food, wine and service. Stop in for a drink after work and sample our award-winning list of 100 wines by the glass. Then stay to enjoy an exceptional menu of the finest aged prime beef and market-fresh seafood, including chef-recommended selections such as the Prime New York Strip and King Crab Legs.

Thanks! for a Great Evening!
(signed)
John T. Russell DDS
Yellow Springs Dental Care
(937) 767-7731
